errors.error_description: The installation command uses the incorrect package name 'py-wal' instead of the correct 'pywal16'.
correction_candidates:
You can install the latest release from PyPI:
`pip install pywal`

You can install the latest release from PyPI:
`pip install pywal16`

You can install the latest release from PyPI:
`pip install python-wal`

You can install the latest release from PyPI:
`pip install wal16`
errors.golden_answer:
You can install the latest release from PyPI:
`pip install pywal16`
